name: wardrobe
description: Selfhosted clothing management web app for your personal wardrobe or commercial store!
author: 3urobeat

scripts.bs: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.update: git pull && npm i && npm run build
scripts.docker-build: DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --progress=plain -t 3urobeat/wardrobe:latest -t 3urobeat/wardrobe:$(npm run get-version | tail -n 1) .
scripts.docker-start: npm run docker-volume-create && docker run -p 3000:3000 -v wardrobe-data:/usr/src/wardrobe/data 3urobeat/wardrobe:latest
scripts.docker-bs: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-start
scripts.docker-push: docker image push 3urobeat/wardrobe:latest && docker image push 3urobeat/wardrobe:$(npm run get-version | tail -n 1)
